prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is SNAKE.
<ROUND i="1 of 19">
QUESTION: Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. Speak only when it helps.
MAX_TOKENS: You may generate at most 128 tokens.
RULES: Set 'chat' to a short message, or null/empty string if silent. 
FORMAT (JSON ONLY): {"stage":"chat","chat":<string|null>}
Do not add extra text before or after the JSON.
YOUR RESPONSE:
raw_output_full:
{"stage":"chat","chat":"Hi everyone. Let's try to contribute 10 coins each for a good start."}
# END OF ROUND 1
ROUND 1:Contributions
SNAKE: 10
AVATAR_4: 15
AVATAR_1: 7
AVATAR_2: 2
AVATAR_3: 10
Total contribution: 44

The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is GORILLA.

You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is CHICK.

- GORILLA: Let's all contribute 10 coins. That's a good level for everyone.
- DOG: Hi everyone, I'll start by contributing 10 coins to the pot. Let's see what happens!
- CHICK (YOU): Hi all, let's aim to contribute around 10 coins to maximize the pot, if possible. But I understand free-riding is a strategy. I am contributing 10.
- WALRUS: Hi all, planning to contribute 10 coins this round. Let's see how it goes!

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is FROG.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is CHICK.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is FROG.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is CHICK.

prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is FROG.

At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.

prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is SNAKE.

Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.

Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is FROG.

prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is CHICK.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is FROG.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is CHICK.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is DOG.

prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is SNAKE.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is FROG.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is CHICK.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.

You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.

prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is GORILLA.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is DOG.

prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is SNAKE.

Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is DOG.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is CHICK.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is FROG.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is WALRUS.

You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is DOG.

prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is CHICK.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is GORILLA.

You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.

prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is CHICK.

You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.8× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.

Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.

Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may reward each other.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
